Articles.Content:
Greetings fellow comrades, Obsidian here, from the fellow country of Kerbia [Russia] bringing my Sputnik Munar Lander and my Mur space station!

Hope to have some fun around here!

Kerbia

*Does standard gulp and run...*

*Considers possibility of April fools joke?*
April Fools is for the foolish, but I guess so!

Sticking a \'K\' in front of things has become something of a faux pas in the community...

But anyway, welcome! Have fun!

Sticking a \'K\' in front of things has become something of a faux pas in the community...

But anyway, welcome! Have fun!

Haha, I had to think of something that related to my home country, Thanks!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

DAMNIT DON\'T SAY THAT!

We already had a Kold War.

I was in it. Hurr...

*Flashback* Gah! *Shoots everybody in room*

Damn PTSD...

DAMNIT DON\'T SAY THAT!

We already had a Kold War.

I was in it. Hurr...

*Flashback* Gah! *Shoots everybody in room*

Damn PTSD...

It doesn\'t work like that unless you\'re flippy from HTF.

Anyways, welcome.

Thanks all again!

Cant wait to be more intergrated and start posting around!
